name: Champagne Kush
description: Champagne Kush is an indica-dominant hybrid that offers a variety of attributes suited to different tastes and ailments. With a pleasant and palpable weight on the limbs coupled with a heady, thoughtful mind, this strain adapts to the consumer’s needs with dosage. On the lighter end, expect a headier trip with mood enhancing effects that generally lead to a sense of well-being. But with continued consumption, this strain can lead to a weighted body and mind that feels meditative at its core.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
